attributes.action: make it a legal requirement for all people entering the uk to be be in possession of private medical insurance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: all entrants to the uk should be in possession of private medical insurance to prevent the running down, draining and abuse of the uk national health service. this should be at the point of sale of tickets and should be checked and verified along with passport checks. no insurance no boarding planes boats etc into the uk.
